item.title: Magic
item.description: These are some of the questions I ask myself when I’m creating magic for my world. I personally like magic with rules rather than leaving it to be mystical.

item.title: Rules of Magic
item.description: Is there some sort of rules in your world about magic like laws of thermodynamics? A good example is from Full Metal Alchemist; laws of equilibrant exchange.

item.title: Worldbuilding - Magic and Economy
item.description: Just like any resources and tools in our world, it would impact the economics of your world. Would they be rich if they can use magic because they can do more?

item.title: Worldbuilding - Magic and Politics
item.description: And regulation entails organizational effectiveness, a chain of command, and a structure for logistical support. - Sun Tzu

item.title: Worldbuilding - Magic and Religion
item.description: Magic might be perceived as mysticism or different from divine power from deities. Here are some questions to fill in the gaps.
